functions module¶

Contain method and attribute that are common to both server and client.

functions.getcor(name, mark, board, size)¶

Get coordinate from each players. Make sure it is available coordinates.

Parameters:name – player name.
Returns:returns (y,x) coordinates.
functions.printboard(board, size)¶

Print board

Parameters:
  • board – make board.
  • human – determine board size.
Returns void:

Nothing is returned.
